channel.title: Comments for page "Twilight Guardian"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Twilight Guardian"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
It vanished for me, while going for the ancient discords. Happened 12H ago, or so.
Happened now too, with megaactions x10.
"The Guardian recedes into nothingness.. "

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Can this be verified? (the no un-summoning) I'm right about to get to the 35/40 checks, and I definitely need the 2 range/str to get past themâ€¦

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It seems that the Twilight Guardian got an undocumented change: for a few days now, I've never had it un-summon while running field missions.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The Guardian itself doesn't loop, but the 'flags' that say you found the words does, so all you have to do is pop back into Hidden Forbidden Holy Ground and type the words again.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Does it loop?
If not, to get it do you have to visit The Last Bastion Of Purity again and enter the phrase, or do you have to search for the words again?

[EDUT:] Thank you.
